verses.verse: And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you.

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into me <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, and <S%H5975>set<s%> me on my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> that I <S%H8085>heard<s%> him that <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I <S%H7971>send<s%> you to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to a <S%H4775>rebellious<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> that has <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against me: they and their <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me, even to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For they are <S%H7186>impudent<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> and stiff <S%H2389>hearted.<s%> <S%H3820><s%> I do <S%H7971>send<s%> you to them; and you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And they, <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H2308>forbear,<s%> (for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%>) yet shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that there has <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them, <S%H408>neither<s%> be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H5621>briers<s%> and <S%H5544>thorns<s%> be with you, and you do <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> <S%H6137>scorpions:<s%> be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H6440>looks,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> house.

And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> to them, <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H2308>forbear:<s%> for they are most <S%H4805>rebellious.<s%>

But you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H1696>say<s%> to you; Be not you <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> like that <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H6475>open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> you.
And when I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> an <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H7971>sent<s%> to me; and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> a <S%H4040>roll<s%> of a <S%H5612>book<s%> was therein;

And he <S%H6566>spread<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> me; and it was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>within<s%> and <S%H268>without:<s%> and there was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H413>therein<s%> <S%H7015>lamentations,<s%> and <S%H1899>mourning,<s%> and <S%H1958>woe.<s%>
